casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. Alfred B. ALFONSO, Defendant-Appellant. No. 367. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 20, 1933. Arthur A. Kestler, of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellant. Howard W. Ameli, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Herbert H. Kellogg and Louis Aldino, Asst. U. S. Attys., both of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment of conviction affirmed.
